title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.8 - Appeal papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.8 - Appeal papers

State Regulations

There shall be a statement of appeal, an answer thereto, and, if the appellant so elects, a reply to the answer. The appeal board may, at any time or from time to time, permit or require the filing of additional
appeal papers, including supporting affidavits, memoranda or other papers, upon
such terms and conditions as it may specify. All appeal papers must be
typewritten, captioned to identify the appeal and addressed "To the Board of

Education of the City of New York". Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
